body: Radiohead’s ninth album, A Moon Shaped Pool was released on Sunday night and is available on iTunes, Apple Music and Tidal.  Last week, we asked you to review the new album’s first track, Burn the Witch and now we’d like to find out what you think about the album. On a scale of 1-5, just how good is it and where does it rank amongst the rest? The band are also known for their enigmatic videos; Burn the Witch was followed by Daydreaming – what do you think they’re about?  Share your reviews by clicking on the blue buttons on this article or fill in the form below. You can share photos too, show us your reaction to the album.  We’ll publish the best reviews – and photos - on the site.         Radiohead - Burn The Witch            Radiohead - Daydreaming
webTitle: What do you think of Radiohead's new album? Share your reviews
